name: Einblick
description:
A curious circle gaining insight about other beings and perspectives, but soon realizes that not everything is meant to be known.

Follow the principle of our Professor Bruce A. Block’s The Visual Story. Made by Unity 3D.

Credits

Shixuan Ma - Programmer

Ahmad Mir Mohammad Sadeghi - Level Designer

Jiayi Xu - Visual Artist
